WDY_CTLR_COMPOT.DESCRIPTION: Handling for Suspending and Resuming an Application
Error Handling by Application Before Navigation
Fill Dir-Vacancy tree with filtered vaues
Load information fields (phones ext. from ZAQO)
Method for non-action specific operations before navigation
Method for Validation of User Input
Method for Modifying the View Before Rendering
Method for Modifying the Context Menu
Method for non-action specific operations before navigation
Method for Validation of User Input
Method for Modifying the View Before Rendering
Method for Modifying the Context Menu

WDY_CTLR_COMPO_SOURCE_VRS.SOURCE_LINE: loop at it_vacancies assigning field-symbol(<ls_vacancy>) where directorate_name = l_dir_name.
data: l_node type ref to if_wd_context_node.
* in any case clear the table's filter strings
* if the filter is off: show the whole shebang
* read table lt_sel_vacancies assigning field-symbol(<ls_sel_vacancy>) index 1.
* check <ls_sel_vacancy> is assigned and <ls_sel_vacancy> is bound.
* Assemble the parameter name/value pairs as needed
* in_host = " Requested Host if Not Own
* in_forward_accessibility_flag = abap_true " Forward the Accessibility Flag if Required
* in_forward_param_list = " List of parameters to be forwarded
* in_forward_all_params = abap_false " Forward all URL parameters
* in_append_sapie = abap_false " Append sap-ie=edge or ie5
* out_local_url = " URL (Relative to the Current Server)
out_absolute_url = data(l_url) " Absolute URL (Incl. Log, Host, Port)
data: l_node type ref to if_wd_context_node.
* if the filter is off: show the whole shebang
* data lo_api_controller type ref to if_wd_view_controller.
* data lo_action type ref to if_wd_action.
delete adjacent duplicates from lt_directorates comparing directorate_name.
new_item = <ls_dir> " List of Elements or Model Data
set_initial_elements = abap_false " If TRUE, Set Initial Elements Otherwise Add
loop at lt_vacancies_all assigning field-symbol(<ls_vac>) where directorate_name = l_dir_name. "<ls_dir>-directorate_name.
new_item = <ls_vac> " List of Elements or Model Data
set_initial_elements = abap_false " If TRUE, Set Initial Elements Otherwise Add
data : l_view_cntr type ref to if_wd_view_controller,
* data lo_api_controller type ref to if_wd_view_controller.
* data lo_action type ref to if_wd_action.
catch zcx_ep028_error into data(lx_error). " Internal Vacancy Exception
* msg_user_data = " Caller Data for Later Message Navigation
* scope_permanent_msg = co_msg_scope_controller " Web Dynpro: Lifetime of Message

SOTR_TEXT.TEXT: Please note that according to Procedure for Internal Transfer of National Employees applicant should submit:
EXTERNAL candidates should apply to opened vacancies in www.kpo.kz (Careers – Vacancies) or send CVs to shared mailbox:
